article: How to Use a Visa Gift Card Online
intro: Do you want to use a Visa gift card online?  Gift cards are incredibly useful when shopping for that person that's hard to shop for.  Even store-brand gift cards can be iffy if you don't know what stores or restaurants a person likes.  This is what makes Visa gift cards so handy.  They can be used anywhere that accepts Visa, in person or online.  They can also be a useful alternative for those who don't have a bank account.  This wikiHow article teaches you how to use a Visa gift card online.

points.name: How to Use a Visa Gift Card to Make a Partial Payment

steps.title: You may be able to use a Visa gift card to make a partial payment.
steps.subtitle: If the  on your Visa gift card is less than the total transaction, you'll have to split the payment. Some online retailers provide this as an option, while others don't.
sub-points: To use a Visa gift card for a partial payment on Amazon, add your Visa gift card as a payment option to your Amazon account. Select it as a payment option at checkout, and use your default payment to cover the rest of the balance.

Alternatively, use your Visa gift card to buy an Amazon or other retailer gift card. Most online retailers will allow you to split the transaction total between a gift card and a debit or credit card.
